flawed_nl_solution:
From each tire repair, he made 20-5=$<<20-5=15>>15 profit
So repairs made him a profit of 15*300=$<<15*300=4500>>4500
The two complex repairs each made him 300-50=$<<300-50=250>>250 profit
So those added 250*2=$<<250*2=5000>>5000
So his total profit from everything was 4500+5000+2000=$<<4500+5000+2000=11500>>11500
So he made a profit of 11500-4000=$<<11500-4000=7500>>7500
#### 7500

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 500, not 5000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
